message: Let's be fair - I'll take the lion's share, but you get a nice chunk to start with.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided. Let's be more realistic. I believe this split reflects the power dynamic better, considering I can make you a less favorable offer in the next round.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. This offer is more balanced, and we can end this game.
Alice, time is money, literally! This is my final offer.  It's a fair split, and we both lose if we drag this out further.
